Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Wellington
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero, Diversey, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero, Diversey, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.
